name: Faizan Ahmed

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science & Engineering

about: As a self-motivated engineering student, I am curious about new technologies and their practical applications. With a strong foundation in languages like Java, C, JavaScript, and Python , and experience in web and Blockchain development , I am committed to applying my skills and leadership qualities to contribute to real-world projects.
developmentSkill: Full-stack web application, Blockchain application, IoT project, and Android application development experience. Skilled in front-end, back-end, and cloud technologies, including Firebase and MongoDB, for dynamic and secure applications with real-time databases. Experienced in blockchain technologies such as Ethereum, Solidity, and Web3.js. Proficient in Android development using Java and Kotlin, with a focus on building efficient and scalable mobile applications. Proven ability to integrate diverse platforms for high-performance, cross-functional applications.
contact: I'm always looking for exciting collaborations and new projects. If you're facing a creative challenge or have an idea you'd like to develop, I'd be thrilled to discuss how I can help bring it to life. I'm available for hire on a freelance basis and am also open to exploring full-time opportunities. Feel free to email me with any questions or opportunities you'd like to discuss. I'm open to various types of projects and collaborations.
